inclusion.criterion: Able to provide informed written consent.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Active use of anticoagulant (excluding platelet inhibitors) or other contraindication for prostate biopsies.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Inability to undergo mpMRI scan (pacemaker , claustrophobia, impaired renal function, allergy towards contrast agent etc).
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Any, previous or current, therapy for benign prostate hyperplasia including surgery or medical therapy (except alpha adrenal blockers).
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient is a 63-year-old man presenting to the Emergency Department with acute urinary retention. He is a candidate for urethral catheterization and TURP.
